Package Suggestion

Class SuggestionManager

java.lang.Object
Utility.CSVReader
DataManager.SuggestionDBManager
Suggestion.SuggestionManager
public class SuggestionManager extends SuggestionDBManager
The SuggestionManager class manages suggestions from commitee members, interacting with CSV data. It provides methods to retrieve, add, and manipulate suggestions.

    • getSuggestionsForCamp

      public static Suggestion[] getSuggestionsForCamp(Camp camp)
      Retrieves the array of all suggestions for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp object that corresponds to the target camp.
      Returns:
      An array of Suggestion objects containing suggestion data for this camp.

    • getSuggestionsByUser

      public static Suggestion[] getSuggestionsByUser(User user)
      Retrieves the array of all suggestions by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      user - The User object that corresponds to the user making the suggestion.
      Returns:
      An array of Suggestion objects containing suggestion data for this camp.

    • addSuggestion

      public static void addSuggestion(Camp camp, User committeeMember, String message)
      Creates a new suggestion into the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      camp - The Camp object that correspods to the target camp.
      committeeMember - The User object that corresponds to the committee member creating this suggestion.
      message - The contents of the suggestion

    • approveSuggestion

      public static boolean approveSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion, Staff staff)
      Approves the suggestion and writes the data to the CSV file.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The Suggestion object to be approved.
      staff - The staff who approved the suggestion.
      Returns:
      State of success

    • editSuggestion

      public static boolean editSuggestion(Suggestion suggestion, String newMessage)
      Edits a suggestion in database, only works if it is not approved.
      Parameters:
      suggestion - The Suggestion object to be edited.
      newMessage - The new suggestion message
      Returns:
      status of success
